1.post_text:
Prosperity is what makes you smile!
Whether it’s a delicious Beef Prosperity Burger or an adorable LINE plush collectible - now available for purchase with every Extra Value Meal! 

Get your full set of plush collectibles online today at https://onlinestore.mcdonalds.com.sg/
While stocks last.

comments.message: Hi Mc Donald's, I used to love the maple syrup that came with hotcakes until the recent change of the packaging, taste and colour. I don't mind the packaging but the taste of the syrup doesn't go well with the hotcakes. :( just my humble feedback. Thank you and have a nice day.

This should be a all year round thing, I love haveing hotcakes with a side of scrable eggs everyday with a cup of hot tea. Please make it so and thank you fir the 4 days I got to have hotcakes in the afternoon too. I helped me to get my mind to relax abit after a hard day stressing over the huge servers at work.
How come the Line Messaging toys are not advertised in the web? There's no link to how to pre order too. Am I too late since I only saw the advertisement at the store only?
Also to make it clear that they don't come with hashbrowns.. disappointed.. should be just called  "limited breakfast"

ya rite!! have u checked ur feedback box on 29th december 2014 regarding your "superb" service for macdelivery call order? its been a year and yet no respond? hmmm wonder if i shd repost the feedback here
Lillian, my friend Alice is standing extreme left last row!

3.post_text: Yesterday, Singaporeans welcomed the New Year with us by watching sunrises live-streamed from 20 iconic cities. If you didn’t catch it yesterday; you can relive it right here. The All Day Sunrise live streaming may be over, but we’re still serving All Day Breakfast till 4th Jan, 11am to 5pm. Find out more at www.getupandgo.sg.

4.post_text: The New Year’s first sun rises over Los Angeles and San Francisco and we’re live-streaming it at www.getupandgo.sg. Thanks for joining us on this exciting journey and for starting the New Year with us. We wish you a year filled with happiness, joy and success!

5.post_text: Watch the dawn break over London with the live-stream of the New Year’s first sunrise live at www.getupandgo.sg. And don’t forget to enjoy All Day Breakfast at McDonald’s Singapore from 1–4 Jan till 5pm.

comments.message: Bring Back McGriddles! I miss those.....
Er, available until 5pm isn't all day. Right?
McDonald's breakfast is not right without mcgriddles

Yuk!

Junk food.

I remember tasting such fare years way back and was unimpressed. 

Aaaaaaaaargh, the audacity of charging an expensive price tag.

The pancake is the mushy American type, unlike the crepe of the French culinary fare. I wonder the 'maple' syrup is genuine  or just artificially flavoured.

As for the flat breakfast sausage (without casing) the one in the centre looked over fried and dehydrated.  It has slightly curled up.Please do not bite on your porcelain crown otherwise this sausage will cost you some $2000.

Now, I thought they serve some yellow monkey's brain with the convolutions nakedly exposed. Oh, that is maybe French (how pretentious) or some Anglo-Saxon espionage of what they were fooled into thinking to be Oolala Scrambled Eggs.

How  blasé !

Have you ever been served scrambled eggs with maple syrup.

Mama Mia! The whole fare is fried, fried and fried!

Better say something good about your cardiologist.

Otherwise your coronary bypass would come to more than $10,000!
The food for energy and to see our future happy New year McDonald
My first breakfast of the year 2015!!
YES please bring mcgriddles back! i dont like wholegrain! it taste so damn ew !
MC GRIDDLES BACK ON THE MENU PLEASEEEEEE
To cut cost,you guys change the coffee supplier. Taste horrible!

All day breakfast should at least serve till dinner time. I am so overwhelmed to know at 3pm today and have intended have it for dinner at 6.30pm. Was really disappointed when was told till 5pm and ending tomorrow. 

Hope it can be be considered as a permanent menu, especially hotcakes are well received at any time of the day.

Very disappointed! !! Bought hot cake breakfast  this morning.. when reached my office then realise no butter.. when go back to your branch again.. your staff say no butter..Your staff did not inform before I order.. end up give me this kind of butter.. ??? If know no butter.. I can order other breakfast set!!!
Anyway i called and my area dont have despite not been stated. Please extend breakfast hours alwaysssss

6.post_text:
Treat yourself to a delicious breakfast – in the afternoon! We will be offering All Day Breakfast from 1 to 4 January for all breakfast lovers. All Day Breakfast platters will be available till 5pm over the four days at McDonald’s restaurants and via McDelivery (www.mcdelivery.com.sg)!  

* All Day Breakfast is not available at the following stores: Nanyang Polytechnic, Lido, Clifford Centre, KK Hospital, Tampines Kiosk, Singapore Science Centre, National University of Singapore and Singapore Polytechnic 2

7.post_text: Happy New Year! Start 2015 with hope and optimism of the new year by watching sunrises shot and broadcast live from some of the most iconic cities around the world. Join the All Day Sunrise at getupandgo.sg

8.post_text: Happy New Year, Singapore! Watch the New Year’s first sunrays light Singapore up as we live-stream the sunrise at www.getupandgo.sg

9.post_text: Tonight, as Singapore welcomes the New Year at midnight; Gisborne, New Zealand prepares to witness the world's first sunrise of 2015. Watch it in real time as we kick off the All Day Sunrise at www.getupandgo.sg

10.post_text:
Wave House Sentosa is giving away free rides! We’ve been giving out free rides on our McDonald’s Surprise Alarm app and now, we are giving them away to our Facebook fans. Simply be the first 52 people to write in to singapore@wavehouse.com with your full name, mobile phone number and first 4 digits of your ID/NRIC number and you could win a free ride!

To receive surprises every day, please don’t forget to set your alarm! http://www.mcdonaldssurprise.com/sg

Dear McDonald's, despite your "Big Breakfast" name, I suspect if one have it for breakfast everyday, he would be a very tiny man who would soon become broke. I comfort myself that I paid for the beautifully photoshopped posters instead of the ingredients or portion or taste. Unfortunately, my comfort can last only until the actual food arrives on my table. My suggestion is please serve us with real breakfast given the money paid for. 
And I don't understand why the meat platter in breakfast sets have to be much smaller than the burgers meat? WHY? WHY?

16.post_text:
Prepare your tastebuds for the new Chilli Pepper Ranch Quarter Pounder! Chilli pepper ranch sauce, crisp lettuce and tomato slices come together atop a succulent beef patty, as well as tasty cheddar cheese and turkey bacon. Toasted sesame buns crown this appetite-whetting blockbuster.

To complete your epic meal, turn up the flavour with Cheese Shaker Fries and a Coke Float!

These promotional items are now available in restaurants, while stocks last.

comments.message:
This happened to me this morning when I ordered big breakfast from your guys through delivery. 

So is this still scrambled eggs, or egg omelette? If I want to buy your new coffee, at least it will be great with a proper meal. 

But this... This is interesting.
I brought a reusable cup into the Stawell store today and was told I don't get a discount on my coffee. Do you only offer discounts if it is a McCafe branded reusable cup?
Training is required for McCafe staff. After my initial purchase of the cup, I've been charged full price for refills, and they don't fill the cup to the line.
Already bought it today. But wondering if I buy breakfast set meal, will I get the promotion too if I use the cup???
Hi, is there any way to redeem the first fill later instead of on the spot? Am helping a friend purchase so it's best if I can have an unused keepcup and the free drink for another time. Thanks!
Please bring the reusable cup to Chicago area restaurants!

I was trying to use the cup at McDonald's yesterday. Gave the cup to the counter staff for a latte. I know it's not applicable for the discount but for the spirit of save the earth. But the counter lady was still using the disposable cup first then going to pour it to this mug. I asked her why she didn't use the mug directly? Because what's the point if she is still going to use the disposable cup. And her answer was her manager told her this mug is not suppose to be used at McDonald's. Only at McCafe. I hope you can straighten this out as it doesn't make sense.

Is there any surprise? I bought a fish burger and it came exactly like the usual Fillet O Fish bun with tartar and box but guess what, it's McChicken patty! My child who's allergic to chicken gotten  bad cough and rashes all over eating that! All thanks to McDonald!
DID THE MCWINGS CHANGE ??? WHY DOES IT TASTE DIFF . #ripmcwings

17.post_text:
Express your love for coffee and Mother Earth with a McCafé KeepCup available for just $12.90! The spill proof cup is designed to keep your drink warm and is recyclable. 
 
Enjoy your first fill of a 12oz hot drink on us with purchase of the McCafé KeepCup. Plus, 50 cents off your hot drink purchase every time you reuse the cup at any of our McCafé stores! 
 
The McCafé KeepCup (12oz) is available for a limited time only at the following stores: Parkway, Northpoint, Kallang, Tampines Mall, Choa Chu Kang 62, Great World City, Causeway Point, West Coast Park, Changi Airport T2, Ang Mo Kio Park, SpringLeaf Tower, Resorts World Singapore, JEM, Toa Payoh HDB Center, Suntec City and Metropolis.

This Sunday, we’ll be hosting the last Family Breakfast Picnic! For the chance to be one of the 20 families to join us at this event at Bishan Park McDonald’s, tune in to KISS 92FM and watch out for our on-air contest! 
 
Each family will receive a picnic mat, picnic basket, and complimentary meals for the whole family – 2 American Breakfast Platter Extra Value Meals™ and 2 Hotcakes (2pc) Happy Meals. 
 
Good luck!

24.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0500 hours on 9 December 2014. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders during this period. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.
